animeTitle: Goulart Knights: Evoked the Beginning Black
animeDescription: Unidentified creatures "Archon" suddenly appear and bring the human beings to a crisis of extinction. A special corps "Goulart Knights" is formed to counter attack Archon. The knights have supernatural power to generate "Holy Grail" from their spirits and battle against Archon.
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Goulart Knights', 'Sequel: Goulart Knights: Evoked the Beginning White']
